title: [The Betterment Boutique]
description: The pale and dark blues of the tent swiftly transition to a deep scarlet color overhead, spreading all of the way down the walls to the floor.  Twists of especially dark fabric, arranged in noose-like configurations, peel down from above to drape over several hard-backed steel chairs.  Surrounded by a semi-circle of ivory candles, their wax pooling on the floor, a single gold-framed mirror reflects the wavering candlelight.
